item.title: 美国大型银行为何抵制更大的 "资本缓冲"？
item.description: 美国监管机构去年夏天提出了新规定，要求银行增加数十亿美元的所谓资本缓冲，以便在经济下滑时提供保护。最大的银行将承受最沉重的负担，它们必须将资本水平提高约 19%。这些规定源于 2008 年的金融危机，是在 2023 年四家中型银行倒闭后不久出台的。【原文：US regulators proposed new rules last summer requiring banks to add billions of dollars to their so-called capital cushions, which offer protection during downturns. The heaviest burdens would fall on the biggest banks, which would have to boost their capital levels by about 19%. The rules stem from the 2008 financial crisis and came out soon after the 2023 collapse of four midsize banks.】
